A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best movies of the series. Director Johnson takes some bold risks in the narrative to serve up a movie that is thrilling\, emotional and rich in complex themes and characters. There are sequences that will make audiences stand up and cheer. This is also one of the most beautifully shot installments in the series. Johnson orchestrates exciting action moments\, while never losing sight of the human stakes at large. This is mainstream filmmaking executed masterfully.  One of the best movies of the year!
